page.title: 13SHOPPING SURVEY.
page.content: A few people were {interviewed}in {South Ruislip.}These were carried out on a Tuesday afternoon in July - the shoppers were very helpful. First, two ladies who shop in South Ruislip did so about once a week. They mainly go to the{bakers and grocers.} Second, a man behind a till at a train-station. He said it gets busy between 7.30 and 9.30am and 4.30 - 6.30pm. Third, a shop keeper over the road from the train station. She said that she gets lots of people going there. Fourth, another lady said the shops she went to were not very good because they were very expensive. Last of all was the{butchers.}The shop keeper said, all the prices are average. The dearest product was the fillet steak.
